content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


1. Review vulnerability scan results and web scraping results for potential targets.
2. Review sub components of web applications for vulnerable versions. If the web application uses open source software consider downloading and review the code (as time allows).
  • Use cvedetails and exploit-db.com to search for know issues and exploits.

  • Google Dork: "software version exploit"

  • Consider looking for magic bytes in java applications.

  • Consider reversing ActiveX plug-ins.

  • Command injection.

  • Discover hidden content and files with a fuzzdb data, go buster, burp content discovery.


Reference


https://github.com/GrrrDog/Java-Deserialization-Cheat-Sheet

Reporting Requirements


Add finding for vulnerable version and show screenshot of version.
